name: Race 2018-Rainbow Road Heist !
description:
Dive right into this Race 2018-Rainbow Road Heist. An iOS exclusive racing game ! Available FREE now.

We brought you Race 2018-Rainbow Road Heist and exclusive iOS title. Where you can race and perform stunts like crazy at the same time. Enter the Race 2018-Rainbow Road Heist and drive most exciting cars and trucks. Use power ups to get ahead in the competition ! and avoid obstacles. Use ramps to perform stunts in such a way that you can lead the race. As fun it sounds, it's as risky anything can get. Good luck driver.

YOU CAN SELECT DIFFERENT CARS, EACH ONE BETTER THAN THE LAST:
The game features different variations of cars. Select the one you want. We picked the best cars and trucks we could get and included in the game. The biggest rally racing you'll ever see.

MANY DIFFERENT ENVIRONMENTS:
There are multiple environments. Desert offroad, snow blizzard, lava melted town and Rainbow Road. You're not supposed to drive safely here. Just win the RACE!! Be as flashy as you possibly can and have fun. Yes that the most important thing of them all. Have FUN!

RACING MODES:
You can race in different modes. Such as circuit, sprint, knockout, speed trap, time attack. Show us what you can do in these situations

THE PERFECT CONTROLS TO PULL OF AMAZING STUNTS:
The controls are smooth and easy. Handle your carm there are ramps where you can perform stunts. Run through the ramp and place your car in such a way that you could get ahead of your opponents !
FREE TO PLAY FOR A LIMITED TIME:
This game if free for now. We would like you to enjoy this game without having any issue and free of cost. Play it all you want.


Leave a review help us improve our game. So that you can have a better experience !
